name: RTCDtlsTransport.state
description: The state read-only property of the RTCDtlsTransport interface provides information which describes a Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) transport state.

The state read-only property of the RTCDtlsTransport interface provides information which describes a Datagram Transport Layer Security (DTLS) transport state.
